tool_description: Easily convert text between different letter cases: lower case, UPPER CASE, Sentence case, Capitalized Case, rANdOm cAsE, camelCase, kebab-case, and more.
name: ConvertText
title: ConvertText

api_list.name: Convert simple text strings
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to convert text to any case passing the "type" as a query parameter.
